sentences.sContent: The construct, driving principle and output performances of the cylinder type ultrasonic motor with multi-degree of freedom were presented.
sentences.sContent_eng: The construct, driving principle and output performances of the cylinder type ultrasonic motor with multi-degree of freedom were presented.
sentences.sCn: 介绍了自行研制的圆柱形多自由度超声波电动机的结构、驱动原理和输出性能。

sentences.sContent: Echo Sounder is a kind of acoustic measuring depth equipment, which can measure depth with the time between transmitted wave and echo on condition in which the speed of ultrasonic is fixed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Echo Sounder is a kind of acoustic measuring depth equipment, which can measure depth with the time between transmitted wave and echo on condition in which the speed of ultrasonic is fixed.
sentences.sCn: 回声测深仪是用来测量水深的一种声学测量设备，其以水中超声波的传播速度为确定条件，利用发射波与反射回波时间差来测量水深。

phrases.pCn: 超声波测试；超声波探伤法
超声波清洗；超声波消磁

words.tran: 超声波检查法；超声波扫描术

trans.tranOther: ultrasonic sound waves are too high for humans to hear
